default.name: Default
default.desc: Standard page configuration. (Content and Primary Sidebar.)

feature.name: Feature Template
feature.desc: A page template designed to quickly and concisely show off key features or points. (RevSlider, iBoxes, Flipper)

landing.name: Landing Page
landing.desc: A simple page design with highlight section and postloop (content).

ibox_array.title: Stay in Touch
ibox_array.text:
New to PageLines? Stay in touch by following us on Facebook and Twitter.

[like_button url="http://www.facebook.com/pagelines/" ] [twitter_button type="follow" handle="pagelines"]

ibox_array.title: Forum
ibox_array.text: Have questions? We are happy to help, just search or post on PageLines Forum.

ibox_array.title: Docs
ibox_array.text: Time to dig in. Check out the Docs for specifics on creating your dream website.
